title: Season 2 of ‘The Morning Show’ Continues To Get More Baffling
description:
Bill Simmons, Amanda Dobbins, and Nora Princiotti get together to talk about Season 2 of ‘The Morning Show,’ which continues to make baffling, but fun, decisions.

Hosts: Bill Simmons, Amanda Dobbins, and Nora Princiotti
Producer: Kaya McMullen
